price: 60. Longola sé mwasi waye, tosila kokata (Allah) ete akozala o kati ya baye bakozua etumbu.
arabic: إِلَّا ٱمۡرَأَتَهُۥ قَدَّرۡنَآ إِنَّهَا لَمِنَ ٱلۡغَٰبِرِينَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: illā im'ra-atahu qaddarnā innahā lamina al-ghābirīna
